Topic.Title: Create SMS based conversations with this free online tool

Posts.EditableText:
I made the following tool using Squiffy that allows people to easily create chat style conversations in the format of popular messaging clients.

It's all web based and most people use it to make short funny stories to share with their friends. But in theory you could use it as part of your game, using an iframe to embed where needed.

Feel free to check it out.

http://mychatstory.com
